comments.content:
Sphinx provides directives and roles for describing command line programs. We should use them for nova-manage.

http://sphinx.pocoo.org/domains.html?highlight=program#directive-program
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~doug-hellmann

comments.content:
This syntax does not permit option without “-”, “--“ or “/” prefix when using sphinx 1.1.3.

This issue is not present in sphinx 1.2.2.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~romain-m

comments.content:
But generate a WARNING at reference call

for instance:

.. program:: nova-manage

.. option:: db version

    Print the current database version.

:option:`nova-manage db version`


WARNING: Malformed :option: u'nova-manage db version', does not contain option marker - or -- or /
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~romain-m

comments.content:
This wishlist bug has been open a year without any activity. I'm going 
to move it to "Opinion / Wishlist", which is an easily-obtainable queue 
of older requests that have come on. If you want to work on this,
just push a patch to Gerrit, there's no need to track this with a
bug report.

If there are any questions left, feel free to contact me (markus_z)
in the IRC channel #openstack-nova
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mzoeller
